txt.en: 'Though the hall may seem cold to the eye of a stranger, it is actually quite inviting.'
'If ever you are feeling alone in Thorin's Hall, you can seek out companions by any fire or in the forge and market halls.'
'Ah, the echoes in the great hall...that's what home means to me.'
'Though Thorin's Hall is home, one day we will return to the halls of my fathers and dwell once more in Khazad-d√ªm!'
